sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row>
    <v-col
      cols="12"
      sm="6"
      md="6"
    >
      <v-menu>
        <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
          <v-btn
            v-model="date"
            label="開始日"
            readonly
            v-bind="attrs"
            v-on="on"
          ></v-btn>
        </template>

        <v-date-picker
          v-model="date"
          scrollable
          @input="$emit('input', $event.replace(/-/g, '/'))"
          no-title
          locale="ja-ja"
          :day-format="value => new Date(value).getDate()"
        >
        </v-date-picker>
      </v-menu>
    </v-col>

  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
import { formatDateToJa } from '../../functions/datetime';

  export default {
    data: () => ({
      date: (new Date(Date.now() - (new Date()).getTimezoneOffset() * 60000)).toISOString().substr(0, 10),
    }),
  }
</script>
